features.name: Authentication & Security
features.description: User signup, login, JWT token management, password reset via email, and Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) support.

features.name: Server & Channel Management
features.description: Creation and management of Servers, Categories, and Channels (Text, DM, Group DM). Includes role-based permissions and member management.

features.name: Real-time Messaging
features.description: Socket.IO based real-time messaging system supporting text, file attachments, message editing/deletion, and threading.

features.name: Notification System
features.description: Real-time notifications for mentions, keywords, and system alerts. Includes email notifications for new device logins.

features.name: Search & Retrieval
features.description: Advanced search capabilities for messages and files with various filters (date, user, channel).

features.name: User Profile & Settings
features.description: User profile management (avatar, status), notification settings, and bookmarking messages.

features.name: AI Integration
features.description: Integration with Google Gemini API for AI-assisted responses or features.
